mediaDisplay.text:
Use the Search feature to look for a specific movie, picture, or music file stored on any external device connected to the media player. Open the Search screen from the Movies, Pictures, or Music menu.
1. Press "Menu" on the remote to display the on-screen main menu. 2. Use the arrow keys on the remote to highlight "Movies," "Pictures," or "Music" in the menu and press "OK" on the remote. 3. Press "Menu" again on the remote to display the menu for the displayed page. 4. Use the down arrow key on the remote to highlight "Search" and press "OK" on the remote. The Search keyboard is displayed. 6. Use the arrow keys on the remote to select letters on the Search keyboard and enter search information for the media file you’re looking for. 7. When you’ve entered your search information, click "Done" on the Search screen. The screen lists all files containing the search information you entered. 8. Use the arrow keys on the remote to highlight the file to be played and press the Play button on the remote. 9. If the file you’re searching for is not listed, press the Back button on the remote to return to the Search keyboard and enter more specific search information.
